titleStmt.title: The history of Appian of Alexandria in two parts : the first consisting of the Punick, Syrian, Parthian, Mithridatick, Illyrian, Spanish, & Hannibalick wars, the second containing five books of the civil wars of Rome / made English by J.D.
Historia Romana. English
titleStmt.author: Appianus, of Alexandria.
Davies, John, 1625-1693.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: First ed. of this translation by John Davies; the translation has been attributed erroneously to John Dryden. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
